DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare PK parameter single dose test tablet formulation AKB-6548 relative single dose reference AKB-6548 tablet formulation , treatment administer without food , compare PK parameter test tablet formulation give fed fasted condition .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Two Formulations AKB-6548 Food Effect New Tablet Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 18 55 year age , inclusive , body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . Current past history cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , pulmonary , renal liver disease . Positive serology result HBsAg , HCV , HIV Screening . Significant renal impairment evidence estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 65 mL/min Known active cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) history chemotherapy use within previous 24 month . Current past history gastric duodenal ulcer diseases GI tract ( include gastric bypass surgery ) could interfere absorption study drug . Subjects know history smoking and/or use nicotine nicotinecontaining product within past 6 month .
